name: World Wide Netflix
description: A collabrative effort on developing a website that show's visitors movies available on netflix outside of their region. Using ReactJS for the client side to build a seamless user interface. We used Ruby on Rails to create an API that consumes a 3rd party API but also store authenticated and authorised user information

name: My First Project
description: My first major project included creating a website where you can store contact information

name: FizzBuzz
description: One of the first things we did with Ruby was to create the FizzBuzz game

name: Future Projects
description: Right now I am still learning the capabilities of the different languages that I am learning, but I am looking foward to what I can do with them once I am done.
